fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Watch (Night): Give a player powerful defense. If your target is attacked, kill the attacker. The attacker will appear as a Stardust Angel and will have their will wiped.
-Guard (Night): Give yourself powerful defense. 1 use. If you are attacked, kill the attacker. The attacker will appear as a Stardust Angel and will have their will wiped.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If you kill someone, the Town will know all non-Unseen that visited your target, excluding the attacker. If nobody but the attacker and you visited them, a random non-Unseen player will be said to have visited them.
